decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990.

| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings: Application Form, Site Location Plan, Block Plan, Drawings Nos. 01 Rev A, 02, 03 Rev A, 04 Rev A, 05, received 20.09.2021
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building on this site, as indicated on the approved plans listed on Condition 2.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D4 and D5 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).
| The proposed roof extension side elevation window shown in the proposed elevations and plans shall be obscure glazed.

Reason:  To protect residential amenity, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D5 and D6 of the London Plan (2021), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).
description: Rear roof extension to rear outrigger roof slope and installation of one roof light to front roof slope and installation of window to outrigger side elevation and removal of chimney
